profile:
Lloyd HVAC Services Inc. is a full service Heating, Ventilation and Air Conditioning (HVAC) company. We are committed to providing quality, professional heating and Air Conditioning installation, repair and maintenance for residential and commercial projects; our rates are competitive and we guarantee our workmanship. 

We are centrally located in Toronto and provide service all across the Greater Toronto Area. Lloyd HVAC Services is a HRAI member company and maintain a good standing with the TSSA and WSIB. We also carry a 2 Million Dollar liability insurance to ensure that all out customers are protected. 

We work to a high and exacting standard using only qualified and experienced technicians that are always ready to respond when malfunctions occur in your heating, cooling and related equipment. 

Whether you are in need of an emergency service call, new installation or preventative maintenance & cleaning, our experienced technicians can provide you with fast, friendly service, sales and installation of various types of HVAC equipment to meet your needs and budget.

Our services include:
*Design / Build for complete HVAC Systems 
*Natural Gas Installation
*Custom Duct Work
*Furnaces
* Wall Furnaces
*Boiler 
*Hydronics
*Air Conditioning
*Ductless Heat Pump

*Tank less Water Heaters
*Humidifiers

profile:
AZ Systems Heating and Cooling is the Right Choice in Newmarket, Aurora, and surrounding areas!

If your HVAC system breaks down, you can trust AZ Systems Heating and Cooling to get it up and running quickly and quietly in the background. As licensed and specialized HVAC experts, we can solve any heating, air conditioning, or ventilation issue.

As Heating and Cooling systems tend to break down at the wrong moment, we know that having a repair can be a stressful time. With that in mind, AZ Systems Heating and Cooling will always be the epitome of professionalism, delivering quality work and service with a smile for all of our customers.

We want to show you that HVAC problems are not the end of the world, even though they may feel like it. For a quick and affordable fix, call AZ Systems Heating and Cooling today at 416-894-4005 to book your free in-home visitation estimate! 

Our team also services commercial work for Rooftops, Ductless Cooling and Heating, walk-in coolers and Freezers.

profile:
The founders of Parc Mechanical, Marc Samperi and Prab Kalsi, have a combined 35 years of experience in the Heating, Ventilation, Air Conditioning and Refrigeration industry. Both began their training in residential and light commercial HVAC, and moved on to complete their 313A Refrigeration and Air Conditioning apprenticeships through commercial and industrial companies to become Licensed Journeymen.

Through years of field experience, Marc and Prab are experts in the HVAC and refrigeration industry on installation and service. As service managers, and formen at top industry companies, Marc and Prab have shown excellent leadership skills in apprentice training and customer service.

profile:
After working for 10+ years for the big players in the industry, our President, Ishmael Ali, decided it was time to become an entrepreneur. 
His goal is to build a brand with a reputation of transparency and trust. 
He believes the focus of business should be the customer, the profit will simply follow. 

Heating and cooling are basic elements that allow us to make it comfortably through our everyday lives, some may call it essential. 
Without these elements, especially during harsh winters or sweltering summers, life can be unbearable. Ishmael stresses that we must not take advantage of individuals that find themselves in these circumstances but rather support them in achieving optimal comfort at a fair price.

Alistar Heating and Cooling Inc. provides all of your residential HVAC needs -- essentials that keep you comfortable regardless of the weather outdoors. 
We pride ourselves on our customer-centric approach to business. 
To us, a customer's satisfaction is equivalent to a job well done. 
When a customer entrusts us to work in their home, not only do we make it a priority to enhance their comfort through the temperature in their home, but it is equally important to ensure they are comfortable with the end-to-end service they receive. 

We proudly offer our services in Brampton, Mississauga, Caledon, Orangeville, Shelburne, Mono, Halton Hills, Milton, Oakville and Etobicoke. 

Give us a call - 416-317-8602
specialities: Furnaces | Air Conditioners | Humidifiers |  Water Heaters | Ductless Heat Pumps | Air Cleaners

profile:
I have 18 years of heating and air-conditioning experience. I've been working in the field since I arrived in Canada (2018) and established my company at 2021. I'm a G2 gas technician and 313D residential heating and air-conditioning technician certificate holder and registered as Independent Designer with BCIN with Ministry of Municipal Affairs.
I cover Hamilton, Burlington, Milton, Oakville, Mississauga, Brampton, Toronto area and some other cities depends on the job size. I do the following:
- All types of gas furnaces and air-conditioning installation, service & repairs.
- All types of air filters installation.
- Water heaters and tankless water tanks installation and repairs.
- HRV's installation.
- Gas pipes installations and connections to stove & BBQ.
- Duct work installation and modifications.
- All types of humidifiers installation.
- Rooftops installation, service and repairs.
- Unit heaters installation & repairs.
- All types of UV lights & humidifiers installation.
- Residential and commercial

profile:
Unicair Heating and Air Conditioning Ltd is a fully licensed company with qualified technicians in Residential, Commercial and Industrial heating and air conditioning equipment. We have served Metro Toronto's heating and cooling needs since 1990. With over three decades in the business, we provide installation and service small to large heating and cooling projects from home appliances to rooftop units. We also provide maintenance and service contracts of your heating and cooling system to look after your indoor comfort needs and also to extend the life span of the system. Our reputation is based on providing dependable superior quality products and services to the consumer at competitive prices. We are not cheap, but our services are the best.

Unicair will design and perform all work in a professional manner and will treat your property with the respect it deserves. All our technicians are qualified to handle any HVAC equipment from service to installation.

profile:
Vese Heating & Cooling Proudly Provide HVAC service in GTA  Area 

We are a leading-edge home air quality and comfort company established in Mississauga Ontario. Our company proudly provide service for residents in GTA and the surrounding communities. We’re a family-owned and operated business. Meaning that every customer who entrusts us with his or her heating and air conditioning needs receives the family treatment. 

Our philosophy is “Win, Win, Win”. Our customers win first, our employees win second and our company wins third. When all three win it’s a great thing for everyone. If one loses, all three lose. This formula is the basis for our “100% Satisfaction Guarantee” and for “treating people the way we want to be treated”. When you choose Vese Heating & Cooling you cannot lose!

In addition to the many heating and air conditioning services we offer our customers we also take pride in our all-star staff. At Vese Heating & Cooling  , each person is properly trained and licensed so that he or she exceeds your expectations when providing you with a home comfort solution.

To make sure we maintain our high standards, Vese Heating & Cooling routinely conducts evaluations to reassess our goals for the betterment of both the company and our customers. By doing so, we strive to continue to provide heating and air conditioning services to residents in GTA and the surrounding area.

profile:
If you live in Canada, you must be aware of its harsh winter season when the temperature can drop down to more than minus 20 degrees. Almost every building, whether it is residential or commercial, comes with in-house HVAC systems, and we are here to ensure the utmost comfort for the people of GTA.

Chin’s Heating and Cooling has been in the industry since 2009, and it has earned a batch of excellence in the field by delivering highly satisfactory HVAC solutions around all provinces. We always take care of the quality and durability of the products we use in our project. Be furnace, air conditioner, water heater, thermostats or air quality services, and we are here to address all HVAC-related problems.

We have developed domain expertise through our experience and continuous effort to become the industry leader. We wish to give our clients the ultimate comfort with our comprehensive HVAC solutions. As an industry leader, we take care of quality, safety, energy efficiency, repair, maintenance and warranty so that you can get long-lasting heating and cooling solutions within your budget.
project_minimum: No job is too small or big

M & M Heating and Cooling Company, the most experienced and trustworthy HVAC Company in Toronto. With more than 30 years of combined expertise in the industry among our staff members allows us to provide our customers with the best service experience possible, offering smart heating and cooling solutions for both residential and commercial spaces. Our main goal is to ensure that the tradition of customer satisfaction lives on today, and we achieve this through our reliable and highly trained staff. One of the best local HVAC Company Toronto.

M & M Heating & Cooling was founded in 2005. Proudly combining 30 years of experience M & M Heating and Cooling has evolved into one of the most stable and dependable service companies.

Our people is our greatest strength. Here at M & M Heating & Cooling, we pride ourselves on high-quality workmanship, exceptional service, and trustworthiness. All members of our technical teams are properly certified, factory trained and well-experienced. Our customer service representatives possess the necessary technical expertise and equipment knowledge and are always ready to answer your questions over the phone.

M & M Heating & Cooling is proud of our tradition of excellence serving homeowners and business in GTA. Our mission is to provide our customers with the best service experience possible and we achieve this through our reliable and highly trained staff in our Heating and Cooling Company Toronto.

profile:
Incepted in 2004, My Home Comfort aims at offering home owners enduring comfort and peace of mind through worry-free HVAC installations, repairs and maintenance.

With a wide spectrum of air conditioners, water heaters, furnaces and humidifiers that stand for superior quality, we provide our customers with extensive solutions to meet their specific cooling, heating, air and water treatment needs.

What make our offerings more suitable and desirable are our financing programs that are designed to assist customers economically with their HVAC installation, maintenance and repairs.
services:
Air Conditioning
Replace, repair and maintain your cooling system with the assistance of experienced and trained technicians. Also, you can seek knowledgeable advice of our experts to find an ideal solution for your residential or commercial air conditioning needs.

Furnaces
Create a warm and comfy environment in your home in the cold winter season with the installation of a functional heating system. Ensure year-round comfort with our regular maintenance packages or repair the existing system to operate at peak efficiency.

Water Heaters
Keep your household functional with continuous supply of hot water through our same-day water heater installation and replacement service. With all our professionals certified and trained in HVAC systems and maintenance, you can rest assured that your project is in safe hands.

Humidifiers
Whether you seek regular servicing or professional installation, our in-house team of engineers can maintain and service all makes and models of humidification systems with minimal inconvenience and maximum satisfaction.

Thermostats
While air conditioners, furnaces, humidifiers and water heaters are a common source of home comfort, thermostats have an essential role to play when it comes to operating these systems.

A thermostat activates or deactivates cooling and heating systems to control the temperature within the home. However, the functionality of thermostats varies from model to model and choosing the right can help you save a lot of energy and money on utility bills.

Gas Lines
When it comes to gas line installations and repairs, quality and safety remains inevitable. We specialise in safe gas line repair and replacement and are committed to fast service, fair pricing and 24/7 support.

In addition, all our products and services are backed by limited warranties that guarantee complete satisfaction and peace of mind. We also offer different financing options for our customers to fulfill their HVAC needs without breaking the bank.
payment_method: Cash, Check, e-transfer, Money Order and Credit Card

profile:
Welcome to Mistry Mechanical Inc. We offer heating, air conditioning, gas lines, filtration, humidification, custom duct work, mini split units, firepits, tankless water heaters, and hydronics services.  We also offer installation, service of all HVAC equipment and brands.  We are proudly a Armstrong Air dealer and carry other brands as well.  

Give us a call today to schedule your appointment. We look forward to hearing from you.

profile:
If you are seeking a service-driven, highly qualified team of HVAC professionals to install and maintain you’re heating and air-conditioning equipment, then Nu-Air Mechanical Limited will be of interest to you.
Nu-Air Mechanical has been in the service business for 10 + years and one of our best measures of success is our impressive roster of repeat customers. We have worked hard to meet our customers’ expectations and we will always continue to do so. Our technicians are all highly qualified with training experience and have a commitment to provide consistent quality standards and have best value to all our customers. Our service and reliability are second to none.

profile:
AZ Comfort Air is a Mississauga residential and commercial heating & cooling service company.
With 35 years of combined experience in the HVAC industry, our extremely knowledgeable staff can install, service, and maintain your home gas furnace, air conditioner or water heater as well as we service commercial air system backed with a premium five-year parts and labor warranty that is almost exclusive to AZ Comfort Air. Our history stands behind us.

We service and maintain all other major name heating and cooling systems to satisfy the needs of our Mississauga home owners. We work with both residential and commercial HVAC systems. We can service any brand name, guaranteed. Call us for a FREE estimate for a new gas furnace or air conditioner installation.

When required, subcontract work to a licensed professional for Refrigeration.

profile:
ABOUT US:
Green Care Energy (GCE) has been serving the GTA for over 10 years. We are an authorized American Standard dealer while also providing all other brands. GCE has gained the trust of their customers over the years because we provide the highest level of standard when it comes to customer satisfaction. With our highly qualified experts were able to provide fast and reliable service and products. Treating each customer with respect and fairness has always been our company policy, which has lead to the success and growth of our company. Building long term relationships with our customers is our objective and the long term goal of our company. 

	WHY CHOSE GCE?
Green Care Energy will ensure a proper installation with a quality unit to reach the highest  efficiency and performance the equipment should achieve. Our team of experts will help you select the right 	equipment for your home or commercial business , installed with the highest accuracy with respect to its specification, and maintain your equipment to ensure a long and efficient performance.

profile: Air Solar System is founded by some of the best and brightest talents in HVAC Industry. We accumulated over 18 years of experience inside and outside of Canada with the state of the art engineering.Since our establishment in Canada, Air Solar  has continued to follow our basic philosophy of helping customers through better understanding of customer needs.Heating, ventilation and air conditioning (HVAC) is the technology of indoor and vehicular environmental comfort. Its goal is to provide thermal comfort and acceptable indoor air quality. HVAC system design is a subdiscipline of mechanical engineering, based on the principles of thermodynamics, fluid mechanics, and heat transfer. Refrigeration is sometimes added to the field's abbreviation as HVAC&R or HVACR, or ventilating is dropped as in HACR

profile:
“THE INDOOR CLIMATE SPECIALISTS”

As a family-owned business for over 45 years in the Greater Toronto Area, World of Comfort has been taking care of the air you breathe.  From furnaces and air conditioners to boilers and radiant floors to service and seasonal maintenance, we’ve been looking after your indoor comfort needs.  We are the “Indoor Climate Specialists”.  Making the air you breathe…fresh, clean and comfortable.  And we are a York Certified Comfort Expert!

We custom design and build our cooling and heating systems just right for your home or business and we guarantee our service. 

Our HIGH EFFICIENCY PRODUCTS include:

• GAS FURNACES
• HEATING BOILERS
• TANKLESS WATER HEATERS
• CENTRAL AIR CONDITIONERS
• DUCTLESS AIR CONDITIONERS
• HEAT PUMPS
• RADIANT FLOOR HEATING
• HEAT RECOVERY VENTILATORS
• AIR CLEANERS
• POWER HUMIDIFIERS
• PROGRAMMABLE THERMOSTATS

Thank you for choosing World Of Comfort Ltd. We are confident that our high quality products and renowned service will more than satisfy your indoor climate and comfort requirements.
services:
Installation, maintenance and service of:
* Gas Furnaces
* Heating Boilers
* Tankless Water Heaters
* Central Air Conditioners
* Ductless Air Conditioners
* Heat Pumps
* Radiant Floor Heating
* Heat Recovery Ventilators
* State-of-the-Art Air Filtration and Cleaners
* Power Humidifiers
* Programmable Thermostats

* Eco-Energy Audits
* Duct Cleaning
.

profile:
Cavalry Mechanical is a full-service company specializing in all aspects of plumbing for commercial, residential and multi-family housing.  We ensure that each job, no matter the size, is given the time and attention it deserves.  We offer free quotes for your project and can offer new, innovative ideas.  We try to think outside of the box to ensure you have a multiute of choices for your project.

We are a locally- owned and operated company with over 30 years of experience in the Plumbing industry. Over the years we have progressed in our success with professionalism, integrity, honesty and our dedication to taking pride in our workmanship. With dedication and confidence, we guarantee our workmanship and materials.  We have a close working relationship with our suppliers which ensures that we are up to date on the latest products and technology in the industry.  We are aware of the needs an requirements for any job or project that you may be looking to undertake.

At Cavalry Mechanical Ltd. we are a full service contractor. Providing you with all your residential & commercial needs. Everything from small plumbing repairs to a complete installation. Being full service, this includes all HVAC and electrical repairs or new projects. Before any work is performed we give you a quote so you know what your getting for the price that works for you. All work is included with a one year warranty on parts and labor. So call in the Cavalry to get the job done right the first time!

profile: For the most dependable and affordable home comfort in Toronto, call Rinia Group Mechanical. Our certified team of HVAC technicians services, installs and repairs all makes and models of furnaces, heating systems and air conditioners, including ductless air conditioning and heat pumps. profile:
We are a fully licensed Toronto heating and air conditioning company providing professional & reliable HVAC services to residential & commercial customers since 1992. 
Our expert HVAC technicians are trained specialists in all heating and air conditioning services, water heaters, humidifiers, boilers & fire places. 
We sell, install & repair all major brands such as: Trane, Goodman, Carrier, Bryant, Rheem, York, Amana & more. Call us today for outstanding heating and air conditioning services

profile:
TEMPRTECH is a full service HVAC/R contractor (heating, ventilation, air-conditioning and refrigeration) serving the commercial, institutional, industrial, and Residential markets in Kuwait

Complete HVAC/R system design, repair, and installation energy management & indoor air quality services comprehensive preventative maintenance packages to keep your systems at peak performance and reliability. 

On-call emergency repair service and support 24/7, 365 days of the year. Extended warranty available on installations and equipment
 
PREVENTATIVE MAINTENANCE
we repair all types and brands of HVAC equipment to prevent breakdowns and equipment failures through preventative maintenance programs.

QUALIFIED TECHNICIANS
We use only experienced, licensed, and certified HVAC service technicians and we are a company you can rely on to maintain and service your HVAC/R and other systems with professionalism, integrity, and reliability.

ENERGY EFFICIENCY SAVINGS
We also offer a full range of energy management services. Let TEMPR Tech help you increase your energy efficiency and control costs while keeping your home or company staff comfortable all year round.

Free Consultation: Energy Management and HVAC Audit
We can recommend ways for you to maximize your energy efficiency and reduce your energy usage as well as show you the cost benefits of preventative maintenance. We can demonstrate your savings in consultation. Call us at   + (965) 677-15988    to set up an appointment.

Improve comfort and air quality - Improve work environment - Improve system reliability

Reduce equipment downtime - Reduce total cost of ownership - Reduce operating and energy costs
 
UP-FRONT PRICING
We believe in treating customers like intelligent people. So there are no hidden costs. You will always receive a true estimate of the costs, a fair price, and the best possible job.

CAPA Heating Air Conditioning & Refrigeration is here to serve your HVAC needs quickly, efficiently and professionally with 24/7 emergency service at an affordable rate to keep you calm and comfortable at anytime.  

Specializing in service, installation, maintenance and repairs on all related HVACR equipment whether it's your system that's unfortunately malfunctioned, a newer more sophisticated energy efficient system needing upgrading or general tune ups & preventative maintenance on your existing system, CAPA Heating Air Conditioning & Refrigeration is here to satisfy your needs with peace of mind being priority. 

Service all makes and models of HVACR equipment in Residential, Commercial & Industrial sectors of the industry on:

profile:
This company was born from a seed of belief that says “We could do it better!” When asked, why us? We think of the 3 pillars of our foundation...

One...We are dedicated to providing homeowners with complete home energy saving solutions. When we say “COMPLETE”, WE MEAN IT! Most companies sell solely based on what they can offer. We believe that much like a doctor, every home needs to be diagnosed based on their own deficiencies.

Two...We offer a better line of products and services, all across the board! While the majority of companies offer products that insider’s call “builder grade”. Essentially a “cheaper” line of product, made to the masses. We have aligned ourselves with companies such as; York – an industry leader in HVAC, and Vinyl Guard – who offer a LIFETIME GUARANTEE on their windows and doors... Just to name a few. 

Three...We do it right! Our technicians know that our mission is to treat YOUR home better that our own. All of our installations are done by an Authorized, Licensed, Green Authority Technician. By not outsourcing the installation process, we can make sure that quality control is top notch.

In a free, one hour, in home consultation, one of our Efficiency Advisors can offer great solutions in making your home energy efficient. Our proven solutions have helped countless families save hundreds of dollars on a monthly basis.

profile:
Simply Comfort is a 100% Canadian owned and operated company. Our Management Team has a combined experience of 50 plus years which helps us serve thousands of our customers to the best of our ability.  Our organization is one of the fastest growing Home Service providers in the industry.
Our Vision

We want to earn customer’s business in Ontario by providing the highest quality products and services at the best possible price for all your home essentials.
By offering a variety of Heating & Cooling options to our customers, we will ensure that your home is equipped with the best quality, High Efficiency products and that you and your family are comfortable during the hottest and coldest days of the season. When you call Simply Comfort, expect that your needs will be met right away. We are available 24-7-365, and our reliable technicians are always prepared. At Simply Comfort, we truly believe that our customers are our first priority.


Our Mission

At Simply Comfort we strive to provide customers peace-of-mind for the most essential equipment in their homes.
Our Vision

We want to earn customer’s business in Ontario by providing the highest quality products and services at the best possible price for all your home essentials.
Our Values

Company Integrity
Honest and straightforward
Environmentally friendly
Community Involvement
Simple and easy to deal with
Make promises and uphold them
Always put the customer first

profile:
With home heating costs rising consistently year after year, now is the time to think about replacing your existing furnace with a high-efficiency furnace.
If your current furnace is more than 10 years old, chances are it is getting to the point where you need to think about replacing it. The process isn't as daunting as you might think, especially with the furnaces available today; you can replace your existing unit with one that is 98% more efficient, as well as built to last significantly longer than the one you have.

profile:
As the third generation of the Gibb family to offer full-service mechanical contractor services in the Midwest, Robert Gibb & Sons Inc. specializes in plumbing, heating, air conditioning, electric-edge of technology and expertise with licensed electricians, journeyman plumbers, pipefitters, factory-trained technicians, and other experts in civil and mechanical engineering, residential and commercial HVAC, plumbing, sheet metal, fabrication, project management, and more. Despite the company’s high level of qualifications and experience, no job is too big or too small to undertake. 

Since 1915 when the company was founded, the Gibb family has taken pride in its commitment to excellent customer service. From multi-million dollar commercial and industrial construction projects to installing and servicing Bryant heating and cooling equipment, they understand excellence isn’t just a goal, it’s a responsibility. For more information, contact its corporate offices at 205 40th Street S. in Fargo, North Dakota or call 701-282-4400.

Address:	
205 40th St S
Fargo, ND
58103

Phone:	
701-282-4400

Website URL:

profile:
Established by a group of professionals with many years of experience in the Heating & Cooling industry, beloved by its customers for high quality of workmanship and support.
At New Tech Home Services we understand that replacement of old Heating, Cooling and Water Heater equipment is not to be taken lightly. This is why we pride ourselves on offering the highest service and professional integrity in our customer approach.
We offer a range of payment and financing options for our product. Customer comfort is our main priority. Choose from cash, credit, deferred payment or simply billing through your utility bill.

15+ years of operation grants us an understanding and knowledge of heating & cooling that is without parallel. This translates to the lowest competitive product prices and industry knowledge of our consultants and technicians alike. You can rest assured that we know and understand the heating and cooling needs, and best interests of your household.

So have a look around the site, familiarize yourself with what New Tech Home Services is all about and see the types of options and savings that are available to you.
Then get in touch with us – we’ll make sure you understand everything and help you every step of the way.

New Tech Home Services Technicians and Representatives Are Fully Licensed, Insured and Bonded.
Call us toll free: 1-888-507-9992

NewTechHome Services is a proud authorized dealer of Goodman equipment  in the GTA. We deal with many worldwide respected companies such as John wood, KeepRite, Rinnai, American Standard and others. 
www.newtechhomeservice.ca
